job description:
The Occupational Testing Services division is seeking a Certifying Scientist to join their team! The position for Certifying Scientist is needed to maintain quality and service in the high volume laboratory. Duties of the position include but are not limited to: Review of GC/MS and LC/MS-MS analysis data to ensure clinical acceptability
Identifying and resolving quality control issues
Accurately entering and reporting test results
Remaining current on lab standard operating procedures.
The OTS Division is headquartered in Research Triangle Park, NC with satellite locations in Houston, TX, Raritan, NJ, St. Paul, MN, and Southaven, MS. With our high volume of patient service centers and contracted collection sites, we can provide any company with their forensic drug or wellness testing needs. About LabCorp® With scientific expertise in esoteric testing, genomics, and clinical and anatomic pathology, LabCorp processes tests on approximately 470,000 specimens each day, applying advances in medicine and science to laboratory testing. LabCorp operates a sophisticated laboratory network, with corporate headquarters in Burlington, NC, and more than 48,000 employees worldwide. Our 220,000 clients include physician offices, hospitals, managed care organizations, and biotechnology and pharmaceutical companies. Laboratory Corporation of America Holdings is listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under ticker symbol LH. To learn more about our organization, visit our website at: www.labcorp.com .
